fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Roll the Dice:** Each night, you can select a player and roll a pair of dice, determining their fate.
- **High Stakes:** If the player you targeted has a special role or ability, their fate will be determined by the roll of a 20-sided die, offering them a chance to succeed or fail spectacularly.
- **Low Stakes:** If the player you targeted does not have a special role or ability, their fate will be determined by the roll of a 6-sided die, resulting in less dramatic outcomes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Lucky Charms:** On Tuesdays and Fridays, your rolls are blessed with extraordinary luck, increasing the chance of favorable outcomes.
- **Unpredictable Nature:** Your actions cannot be detected by investigative roles like the Sheriff or Investigator.
- **Last Laugh:** If you are killed at night, you will have a final roll of the dice, affecting the fate of a random player involved in your death.
